prod_short_desc: Join the battle at the Resistance base!
prod_long_desc:
This exciting Defense of Crait LEGO® Star Wars toy has everything a Resistance warrior needs to play out the epic final battle from Star Wars: The Last Jedi. The set features a highly detailed Resistance Ski Speeder with spring-loaded shooters, removable engine section, minifigure cockpit and a lowering stabilizer. There's also a command tower with stud shooter on top and assorted weapons and tool elements, as well as a foldout trench section with rotating laser cannon and spring-loaded shooter, plus a gun emplacement with a stud shooter. Includes 5 minifigures.
Includes 5 minifigures: Captain Poe Dameron, Admiral Ematt, a Resistance Trooper and 2 First Order Snowtroopers.
Features a Resistance Ski Speeder, command tower and a foldout trench section.
Ski Speeder features 2 spring-loaded shooters, removable engine section, minifigure cockpit and a lowering stabilizer.
Trench section features a rotating laser cannon with spring-loaded shooter and a gun emplacement with stud shooter.
3-level command tower features storage for the included weapons and tool elements.
Weapons include a blaster pistol and 6 blasters.
Also includes Admiral Ematt’s electrobinoculars.
Recreate your own epic scenes from Star Wars: The Last Jedi.
This LEGO® Star Wars toy is suitable for ages 9-14.
Ski Speeder measures over 4” high, 8” long and 14” wide.
Command tower including trench section measures over 4” high, 8” wide and 3” long.
